monitoring.project-root-description: Absolute or relative path to the project you want to monitor. In this case we've put in the relative path to the top-level didcodechange directory, i.e. we'll monitor the didcodechange project.
monitoring.scm-type-description: The type of the source control system for the repository of the project being monitored. At this time, only git is supported.
monitoring.git-executable-description: The path to the git executable
